thread.title: BRIEF-AAR Announces Joint Venture With Indamer For New MRO Facility In India

title: BRIEF-AAR Announces Joint Venture With Indamer For New MRO Facility In India

organizations.name: new mro facility in india reuters

text:
February 7, 2018 / 10:35 PM / Updated 19 minutes ago BRIEF-AAR Announces Joint Venture With Indamer For New MRO Facility In India Reuters Staff 
Feb 7 (Reuters) - AAR Corp: 
* AAR ANNOUNCES JOINT VENTURE WITH INDAMER FOR NEW MRO FACILITY IN INDIA 
* AAR SAYS ANNOUNCED JV WITH INDAMER AVIATIONFOR DEVELOPMENT OF NEW AIRFRAME MAINTENANCE, REPAIR, OVERHAUL (MRO) FACILITY IN NAGPUR, INDIA 
* AAR - NEW MRO FACILITY IN NAGPUR, INDIA, WHICH IS ALREADY UNDER CONSTRUCTION, WILL INITIALLY BE COMPRISED OF SIX NARROW-BODY BAYS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
